home.title: Hi I'm Channy
home.call_to_action: Let's connect and transform ideas into digital reality

about.title: About
content: Hi, I'm Channy, a Paris-based front-end developer and designer passionate about creating visually appealing and responsive applications. My toolkit includes React, TypeScript, and Sass, with a particular fondness for clean design and functionality. While I occasionally dive into backend technologies like Node.js, Express, and PostgreSQL, my heart truly belongs to the front-end.

Over the past decade, my adventures across Asia and Australia have enriched my experience in footwear design, blending aesthetics with practicality. The pandemic brought me back to France, opening a new chapter in technology.

Fluent in both English and French, I effortlessly collaborate in diverse environments. With a background spanning different continents and industries, I offer a versatile approach, balancing creativity and precision in every project.

When I'm not coding, you'll find me running with dogs or any other living beings, staying active, or developing other projects. I love learning new things and taking on new challenges to create great digital experiences. If you're looking for a dedicated and passionate developer, let's connect!

items.name: JL Albany
items.title: Jean-Ludovic Albany Portfolio
items.description: Jean-Ludovic Albany is a Paris-based advertising tracking expert. His portfolio showcases his expertise in a straightforward and graphic manner. The design is simple yet effective, featuring off-white, black, grey, and sunny yellow colors. The responsive website is designed to be visually appealing across all devices. The logo has been redesigned to fit JL's mindset and branding.

images.title: Brand logo has been redesigned and modernised

items.name: Sasha Yoga Flow
items.title: Responsive Yoga Website with Online Booking
items.description: Sasha Yoga Flow is a serene and inviting website dedicated to the practice and teaching of yoga. With neutral earthy tones and a flowy, natural vibe, the website mirrors the essence of yoga. It features simple and easy-to-navigate layouts, combining calm and serene design elements with intuitive functionality. The use of organic textures and gentle color palettes evokes a sense of tranquility and balance, making it the perfect space for guiding users through their yoga journey. The website, catering to a Paris-based audience, offers information on class times, locations, and allows for online booking of workshops.

images.src: assets/sashayogaflow/SASHA LOGO HIRES_square terracotta bg white logo.png
images.title: The logo has been redesigned as well

contact.title: Contact
contact.successMessage: Your message has been sent successfully!
contact.errorMessage: There’s something about the email address entered, could you have a quick look?
content: Whether you're looking for collaboration, have a question, or just want to share your thoughts,
I'm always eager to hear from you. Your feedback and inquiries are invaluable as they help me grow and improve.
Don't hesitate to reach out — let's start a conversation and make something great together!
